mapper.select: SELECT FHS_ID_NO , FTSNM , FARM_AMNNO , FARM_ID_NO , ZIP , DONGUP , DONGBW , OHSE_TELNO , CUS_MPNO , MACO_YN , JRDWO_DSC , RMK_CNTN , DEL_YN , NA_TRPL_C FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND DEL_YN = '0' AND ANW_YN IN( '1','9') AND FTSNM LIKE '%'|| #{ftsnm} || '%' AND HDWK_RG_YN = '1'
